授業方法:
The course will focus on “Experience” through the Group discussion/homework more than lectures, and and physical presence will be strongly requested. Therefore it will be conducted mainly in Face to Face except Lecture 3-4 (Oct. 12), Lecture 11- 12 (Nov. 9) for Online. Group work is required in and outside classes. 
No video recording for group discussion, and some guest speech.

PC use in the class is limited to "Course Material Viewing", "Note Taking" and something which the lecturer permits. Non class related activities e.g. chatting via both offline, online etc. is strictly prohibited in the class, and it is found that you break the rule, your attendance will be recorded as "Absence". 

For online class, you must turn on the "Video" to show your face during the lectures.
